Author: Shorse_rider
Text: well done and you're not being silly. Anorexia isn't about the numbers. Anyone who is anorexic has been a normal weight with distorted thought processes. I am 'recovered' in terms of numbers but because I still struggle - especially if I'm stressed about work/life/anything.   &#x200B;  Don't confuse bloat for actual weight. Just eat your normal meals and see how it goes. If you're not bingeing, you're not going to see a massive gain in weight. In your case, you might not even gain at all. Just stick to your healthy meals.  &#x200B;  Stay strong! X
